page.title: 12Life in a Village Stores.
page.content: Living in a shop is great because you see everybody coming and going. Every Wednesday my Mum and Dad go shopping to buy stock for the shop.It is a{newsagent}and{general stores}in Matfield village,selling sweets,food, novelties,wool and clothing.Sometimes people come to place an advertisement in the window. It is a hard life to live in a shop because my Dad gets up at{5am}to bring in the papers.We open at{6.45am}and close at{5.30pm,}except on Monday when we close at{1pm.}On Sunday we open from{8am}to{1pm.}My Dad and Mum run the shop with{two assistants,}and{9 {paper boys}deliver the daily papers. Friday is very busy because it is their pay day.We have been away for a few days{holiday,}but running the shop is a fulltime job and I can't remember having a long holiday.
